About Fund‑a‑Paw

Vision

To foster a future where every animal in Alberta’s shelters receives the support they need, empowered by a community of informal and engaged donors.

Mission

We develop and maintain a user‑friendly app that provides transparent, real‑time donation opportunities for animal shelters, connecting their specific needs with dedicated individuals, ultimately enhancing animal welfare across Alberta.

Core Values

  • Transparency – Shelters clearly communicate needs; donors see direct impact.
  • Impact – Focus on measurable positive change for animals.
  • Innovation – Use technology to create effective support pathways.
  • Community – Build stronger connections among shelters, donors, and advocates.
